survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Home Automation Installation Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have recently used smart home automation installation services to evaluate their satisfaction and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall smart home automation installation service you received?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall smart home automation installation service you received?

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart home automation features were installed in your home? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all installed features. Include an 'Other' option for additional features not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox for multi-choice selection. Include a text field for 'Other' if selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following smart home automation features were installed in your home? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism of the installation team?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to assess professionalism. Ensure the scale is clear and intuitive.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism of the installation team?

questions.question_text: Were there any issues or challenges during the installation process? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows customers to elaborate on any problems encountered. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text for free-form responses.

script.question_text: Were there any issues or challenges during the installation process? If yes, please describe.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our smart home automation installation services to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation. This is a key metric for customer loyalty.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button for single-choice selection.
